about.description:
The LSC Algorithm Burst Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the python bindings.

name: python-lalburst
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.15.1
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: python-lalburst
    version: 1.5.0
source:
    fn: lalburst-1.5.0.tar.xz
    patches:
        - python3-git_version.patch
    sha256: 2918c61c8c767bfa1fc2d439e9b7ca15e0e7a186ec045a6b563f9dcb6c1a1ca2
    url: http://software.ligo.org/lscsoft/source/lalsuite/lalburst-1.5.0.tar.xz
build:
    noarch: false
    number: '0'
    script: install-python.sh
    string: py36h7eb728f_0
requirements:
    host:
        - asn1crypto 0.24.0 py36_3
        - blas 1.1 openblas
        - bzip2 1.0.6 h470a237_2
        - ca-certificates 2018.8.24 ha4d7672_0
        - certifi 2018.8.24 py36_1001
        - cffi 1.11.5 py36h5e8e0c9_1
        - cryptography 2.3.1 py36hdffb7b8_0
        - cryptography-vectors 2.3.1 py36_0
        - fftw 3.3.8 h470a237_0
        - gsl 2.2.1 blas_openblash47a8a8e_5
        - hdf5 1.10.2 hc401514_2
        - idna 2.7 py36_2
        - lal 6.19.0 hc5f434a_1
        - lalburst 1.5.0 h63c6309_0
        - lalmetaio 1.4.0 h63c6309_0
        - lalsimulation 1.8.0 h63c6309_0
        - libffi 3.2.1 hfc679d8_5
        - libgcc-ng 7.2.0 hdf63c60_3
        - libgfortran 3.0.0 1
        - libstdcxx-ng 7.2.0 hdf63c60_3
        - ligo-common 1.0.3 py_0
        - ligo-segments 1.0.1 py36h470a237_0
        - lscsoft-glue 1.59.3 py36_0
        - make 4.2.1 h470a237_1002
        - metaio 8.5.1 ha92aebf_0
        - ncurses 6.1 hfc679d8_1
        - numpy 1.9.3 py36_blas_openblashd3ea46f_206
        - openblas 0.2.20 8
        - openssl 1.0.2p h470a237_0
        - pcre 8.41 hfc679d8_3
        - pkg-config 0.29.2 h470a237_3
        - pycparser 2.19 py_0
        - pyopenssl 18.0.0 py36_0
        - python 3.6.6 h5001a0f_0
        - python-dateutil 2.7.3 py_0
        - python-lal 6.19.0 py36h7eb728f_1
        - python-lalmetaio 1.4.0 py36h7eb728f_0
        - python-lalsimulation 1.8.0 py36h7eb728f_0
        - readline 7.0 haf1bffa_1
        - scipy 1.1.0 py36_blas_openblashd3ea46f_201
        - setuptools 40.4.0 py36_1000
        - six 1.11.0 py36_1
        - sqlite 3.25.2 hb1c47c0_0
        - swig 3.0.12 hfc679d8_3
        - tk 8.6.8 ha92aebf_0
        - toolchain 2.2.0 0
        - toolchain_c_linux-64 2.2.0 0
        - xz 5.2.4 h470a237_1
        - zlib 1.2.11 h470a237_3
    run:
        - lalburst 1.5.0 h63c6309_0
        - libgcc-ng >=4.9
        - matplotlib
        - numpy >=1.9.3,<2.0a0
        - python >=3.6,<3.7.0a0
        - python-lal >=6.19.0
        - python-lalmetaio >=1.4.0
        - python-lalsimulation >=1.8.0
test:
    imports:
        - lalburst
        - lalburst.SimBurstUtils
        - lalburst.SnglBurstUtils
        - lalburst.binjfind
        - lalburst.bucluster
        - lalburst.burca
        - lalburst.burca_tailor
        - lalburst.cafe
        - lalburst.calc_likelihood
        - lalburst.cs_gamma
        - lalburst.date
        - lalburst.packing
        - lalburst.snglcluster
        - lalburst.snglcoinc
        - lalburst.timeslides
about:
    description: 'The LSC Algorithm Burst Library for gravitational wave data analysis.

        This package contains the python bindings.'
    home: https://wiki.ligo.org/DASWG/LALSuite
    license: GPLv3
    license_family: GPL
    license_file: COPYING
    summary: LSC Algorithm Burst Library
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - duncanmmacleod
        - skymoo

The LSC Algorithm Burst Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
